-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(SQL script 1
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlg.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxidata/nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/part-00000-tid-6133789922049958496-2e489315-890a-4453-ae93-a104be9a6f06-106-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


---Calling procedure to take a look at type of data type inferref by synapse
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
